text: The Trials of Oscar Wilde is a 1960 British biographical drama movie directed by Ken Hughes and was based on the play The Stringed Lute by John Furnell. It stars Peter Finch, Yvonne Mitchell, Sonia Dresdel, Emrys Jones, Lionel Jeffries, James Mason, Nigel Patrick, John Fraser, Maxine Audley, James Booth and was distributed by Eros Films. ==Other websites== * Category:1960 drama movies Category:1960s biographical movies Category:1960 LGBT movies Category:British biographical movies Category:British drama movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Ken Hughes
title: The Trials of Oscar Wilde
